Texts.Chs: 把^green;9个铜线^reset;带给^orange;维纳利斯^reset;。

Texts.Eng: I was ^green;testing your worth^reset; and you passed the test. Your mind is sharp, and I think you'll be an asset to the scientific community. Thank you, ^orange;Agent^reset;.

Use your ^orange;Machining Table^reset; now, and create 9 ^orange;Wire^reset; and bring them to me. I'll jury-rig a fix for your ^green;Teleporter^reset; so that you can ^green;warp to distant locations^reset; such as the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;!
